attributes.action: Parliament & the government to agree to an immediate general election.
attributes.additional_details:
Additionally evidenced by :- 
1, MP’s loosing their whip.
2, MP’s choosing to align with another party.
3, MP’s choosing to set up their own individual party/group.
4, MP’s choosing leave their party and go independent.
4, Important election policies not followed or acted upon.
attributes.background: Parliament & the government to agree to an immediate people’s democratic general election due to the changing of their party representation to that of the people’s original party and party policy vote for their elected members of parliament.
